InstructionData.Title: Pressure Relief Active Vent
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Pressure Relief (Active Vent) # PR-AV-100 # https://github.com/dtandersen/stationeers-library alias Sensor d0 alias Vent d1 alias pressure r1 alias active r2 define setpoint 100 define pipepressure 45000
main: s Vent Mode 1 # inward s Vent PressureInternal pipepressure
loop: yield l pressure Sensor Pressure sgt active pressure setpoint s Vent On active j loop
